title: Convert nano-banana.js to TypeScript with tsx shebang
description: Rename to cli.ts, add types, update shebang to #!/usr/bin/env -S npx tsx

title: Phase 2: Image-to-video and references
description: Support --file in video mode for image-to-video animation, add --reference flag for character consistency

title: Implement --extend flag for video scene extension
description: Add support for extending videos beyond 8 seconds by chaining generation operations. Supports up to 148 seconds (20 extensions). Extension workflow uses URI from previous video. Must enforce 720p resolution for extensions.

title: Add video generation support with Veo
description: Extend nano-banana CLI to support video generation using Google Veo 3.1. See specs/video-generation-spec.md for full implementation plan.

title: Implement --estimate-cost flag
description: Add --estimate-cost flag to show cost estimates without actually generating video. Helps users understand costs before committing to generation.

title: Phase 1: Core video infrastructure
description: Create lib/ utilities (types, client, progress, cost) and add --video flag to CLI with basic text-to-video generation and polling

title: Create example prompts directory
description: Add prompts/ or examples/ directory with sample prompts for image generation

title: Update package.json for @focus-ai/nano-banana
description: Update name, add tsx dependency, update bin field to point to cli.ts

title: Create comprehensive prompting guide with references
description: Write a guide on effective prompting for Gemini image generation, with examples and best practices

title: Phase 5: Polish and testing
description: Add --estimate-cost, update help text, cost confirmations, update package.json

title: Add json-prompting.md example documentation
description: Create example documentation for advanced JSON prompting format for complex video shots. Show structured format examples.

title: Phase 3: Scene extension support
description: Add --extend flag to continue videos beyond 8 seconds, up to 148 seconds total

title: Phase 4: Video skill documentation
description: Create nano-banana-videogen skill with SKILL.md, prompting-guide.md, and examples for LLM guidance

title: Add scene-extensions.md example documentation
description: Create example documentation showing how to use scene extensions to create longer videos. Include best practices for continuous camera movements and establishing shots. Note limitations for dialogue-heavy scenes.

title: Create SKILL.md for nano-banana-imagegen
description: Create skills/nano-banana-imagegen/SKILL.md that teaches Claude to use the CLI
